document_data.name: Olosar
document_data.mainbody:
King '''Olosar''' of [[House Tethyr]] was a king of the [[Lions' Dynasty]] of [[Tethyr]].
{{quote|Bother me not with treaties, embassies, delegations, grand offers of brides to be, or bribes in hand, the surpassing peace of smiling [[god]]s, or eternal youth and bodily vigor! I am grave-tired with niggling responsibilities, and go now to hunt.|King Olosar to his advisors, 22{{nd}} of [[Mirtul]], [[1317 DR]]].}}
document_data.Relationships: Olosar and his older brother [[Jaszur]] were twin sons of King [[Alemander III]], born when their father was only twelve years old! He was uncle to [[Alemander IV]], who would succeed him as king.
document_data.History:
Olosar was born in 1274 DR. He took the throne upon the murder of his brother in [[1295 DR]].

He reigned until [[1319 DR]], when he was succeeded by his nephew, Alemander IV.
